tests.name: create map from named tuples
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (ID STRING KEY, k1 VARCHAR, k2 VARCHAR, v1 INT) WITH (kafka_topic='test_topic', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT ID, MAP(k1:=v1, k2:=v1*2) as M FROM TEST;

tests.name: create map from key/value lists
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (ID STRING KEY, ks ARRAY<VARCHAR>, vals ARRAY<INT>) WITH (kafka_topic='test_topic', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT ID, AS_MAP(ks, vals) as m FROM TEST;

tests.name: create map from named tuples mismatching types
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (ID STRING KEY, k1 VARCHAR, k2 VARCHAR, v1 INT) WITH (kafka_topic='test_topic', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT ID, MAP(k1:=v1, k2:='hello') as M FROM TEST;

expectedException.message: Cannot construct a map with mismatching value types ([INTEGER, STRING]) from expression MAP(K1:=V1, K2:='hello').

tests.name: create map from named tuples all null values
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (ID STRING KEY, k1 VARCHAR, k2 VARCHAR, v1 INT) WITH (kafka_topic='test_topic', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT ID, MAP(k1:=NULL, k2:=NULL) as M FROM TEST;

expectedException.message: Cannot construct a map with all NULL values

tests.name: create map from named tuples and some values
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (ID STRING KEY, k1 VARCHAR, k2 VARCHAR, v1 INT) WITH (kafka_topic='test_topic', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT ID, MAP(k1:=v1, k2:=NULL) as M FROM TEST;

tests.name: create map from named tuples and null key
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (ID STRING KEY, k1 VARCHAR, k2 VARCHAR, v1 INT) WITH (kafka_topic='test_topic', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT ID, MAP(k1:=v1, NULL:=v1) as M FROM TEST;

expectedException.message: Only STRING keys are supported in maps but got: [STRING, NULL]

tests.name: create map from named tuples and null string key
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (ID STRING KEY, k1 VARCHAR, k2 VARCHAR, v1 INT) WITH (kafka_topic='test_topic', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT ID, MAP(CAST(NULL AS STRING) := v1) as M FROM TEST;

tests.name: create empty map
statements: CREATE STREAM TEST (ID STRING KEY, k1 VARCHAR, k2 VARCHAR, v1 INT) WITH (kafka_topic='test_topic', value_format='JSON');
CREATE STREAM OUTPUT AS SELECT ID, MAP() as M FROM TEST;

expectedException.message: Map constructor cannot be empty. Please supply at least one key value pair (see https://github.com/confluentinc/ksql/issues/4239).
